name: Hello Chess Online
description:
World public play, Chess
Strategic brain development play, Chess

Welcome to 'Hello Chess'

This game supports 1 player, 2 player and online play, so you can play against friends or test your skills against a challenging computer opponent.

Featuring:

* Support online play
+ Play online with friends clans all over the world
+ Achievements, Leaderboards and Cloud save for stats
* Perfect for 1 or 2 player games
+ Outstanding AI engine of 5 different difficulty levels
+ Play against a friend in hot-seat mode
+ Board rotation for two player games
+ Computer hint and unlimited undo for beginners
+ Saving your current game
+ Various time control options
* 5 Chess Boards and 5 Chess Piece Sets

Supported by unobtrusive Ads.
